frequency_route_description: The app will record the route every
record_error: Please specify a distance between 0.1 and 10 kilometers.
route_name_placeholder: Enter route name, e.g. Way home, Path to market
from_placeholder: Starting point of the route, e.g. Home, Office
description_placeholder: Note details about this route such as road conditions, points to be careful
confirm_stop_create_description: Are you sure you want to stop creating this route? You will not be able to edit it later.
high_frequency: The higher the frequency, the more detailed the data recording becomes
